document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Twas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">long </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Parting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">time </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Interview </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Come </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Before </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Judgment </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Seat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">last </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">second </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">time </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">These </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Fleshless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Lovers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">met </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Gaze </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">Heavens </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Privilege </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">One </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">another's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Eyes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Lifetime </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">set </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">Appareled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">new </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">Unborn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">except </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">beheld </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Born </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">infiniter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Bridal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">e'er </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Paradise </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Host </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Cherubim </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Seraphim </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">unobtrusive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Guest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: 'Twas a long parting - but the time
